query.statement:
SELECT CESDHPJT, CESDHHNO, CESDHBJD, CESDHHDM, CESDHSNM, CESDHDSZ, CESDHHSZ, CESDHREQ, CESDHUPD, CESDHNAP, (SELECT ZSITE_NM FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE MANDT=A.MANDT AND POSID=CESDHPJT) ZSITE_NM, (SELECT addr1 || addr2 || '(' || zsite_tel || ')' FROM SAPHEE.zmaster01 WHERE MANDT=A.MANDT AND POSID=CESDHPJT) ADDR, (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.zpst0011 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND temno=C.temno AND RETIF = '') NAMET, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.zmmt012 WHERE MANDT=#G_MANDT# AND lifnr=C.lifnr) NAME1, zspec1, zspec7, zspec11,
B.CESDAREP CESDAREP FROM SAPHEE.ZTBESDH A ,SAPHEE.ZTBESDA B ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 C WHERE a.CESDHPJT = #PJT# AND B.CESDAREP = #REP# AND CESDHHNO = #HNO# AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.CESDHPJT =B.CESDAPJT AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CESDHPJT = C.POSID AND A.CESDHHNO = RIGHT(C.POSID_1,3)
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
